dimensions:
Height: 203.5cm (75in.). Width: 229.5cm (81 1/2in)
Pattern: Height of repeat: 101cm (39 3/4 in).                                       Fabric design for lengths to be sewn together as a straight repeat.
title: Bedcover
medium: Technique: Printed by engraved plate on cotton plain weave foundation.
description: Cover made of several lengths and smaller pieces of fabric. Fabric arranged so that the part of the cover that falls over the sides is at right angles to the fabric in the center. Seams are trimmed with woven tape. Design is of animals hunting animals; a pack of dogs attacking a cornered wolf, a pack of dogs attacking a stag, a whippet killing quail, a fox attacking a rooster while hen and chicks flee, a dog attacking a nesting goose, a fox with a foot caught in a snare and a hunting dog next to a gun standing guard over a dead rabbit and birds.
name: Bedcover
